name: Red and Blue (itch) (Tobble Game Studios)
description:
A fun two-player puzzle platformer where there will be two characters, red and blue!. the red player can only step on red tiles and the blue player only on blue tiles. Both players can stay on white tiles. It's best played by two players but it can also be enjoyed by one player!.  There will be future updates added to this game which will include new levels, bug fixes, and more!. 

controls:
WASD to control player blue.
arrow keys to control player red.

W to make the player blue jump.
up arrow to make the player red jump.

D and A to move player blue left and right
left arrow and right arrow to make player red move left and right.
